repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: Cover of brown paper has documentation in roman script- Palmbaltt ms 1914/165 Muktavalī [ ?rg1] (5 illegible letters) 17 Jahrh? Manuscript is wrapped in a thick brown paper and tied using yellow thread. Thin palm leaf as a cover guard. The front cover has documentation information in roman written with black pencil: Sanskrit Manuscript, Title: Muktavalī (perlenkette?) Inhalr: Logik ichriftar? - Grantha. 1924/165 Cover folio added later as they look younger than the leaf of the manuscript. Left margin broken [ha]riḥ and could be name of the section is mentioned in the margin. Only nu is visible. Folios are flipped. Image 57 has the end of śabdapariccheda which fourth chapter in the kārikāvalī. Then image 58 onwards Upamiti section and one folio of anumāna section is also found. Folio numbers are not clearly visible and sometimes they are rubbed out.

msItem.title: Muktavalī
msItem.author: Viśvanātha Nyāyapañcānana
msItem.rubric: 1v 1 śrīmate hayavadanāya namaḥ . (2 syllables crossed out.)
msItem.incipit: 1v 1 anumitiṃ vyutpādayati vyāpārasviti . anumāyāṃ manumito vyāptijñānaṃ kāraṇaṃ parāmarśo vyā 1v2 pāraḥ tathā hi yena puruṣeṇa mahānasādau dhume vanhivyāpti gṛhitā paścāt sa eva puruṣaḥ kvacit parvatādau avicchinna mū
msItem.explicit: 52v 6 ca śukavākye vinaiva tātparyajñānaṃ śābdabodhaḥ vede tvanādimimāṃ sāpariśodhitar 52v 7 kkairavadhāramityāhuḥ .

support.p: Thin palm leaf as a cover guard.

additions.desc: [ha]riḥ oṃ in the left margin on 1v. Left margin is bit broken so ha is inferred.

listBibl.bibl:
Nyāyasiddhāntamuktāvalī Viśvanātha Nyāyapañcānana Bhaṭṭācārya, Nṛsiṃhadeva Śāstrī Vyāsa Prakāśana, Vārāṇasī, 1990
Nyāyasiddhāntamuktāvalī Viśvanātha Nyāyapañcānana Bhaṭṭācārya, Keśava Rāmarāva Jośi Bhāṇḍākara Prācyavidyā Saṃśodhana Mandira, Puṇe 1985
Nyāyasiddhāntamuktāvalī By K R Joshi Bhandarkar Oriental Research Institute, Poona, India 1985

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words and inferred syllables or words are shown using sqare brackets.
